title: [Self-Directed] Short-Intensive Course Based on Gagné’s Model for Improving Pharmaceutical Calculation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic pharmaceutical terminology and mathematical operations
context.additional_context: Classroom-based training environment to enhance job application capabilities for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners solve pharmaceutical calculation problems (dosage, concentration conversion, etc.) with over 90% accuracy
Learners maintain over 80% retention of calculation skills acquired through Gagné’s instructional model in a 6-month follow-up assessment
Learners pass clinical scenario-based calculation problems with an 85% or higher pass rate
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
